channel.title: RE : ● Warning, Read For Your Own Safety ●
channel.description:
[quote="Slivion, post:1, topic:93249"][center][size=15pt][b]Warning[/b][/size]
Don't accept the file that is sent to you in a personal message. The message is going to be sent by [i]orly[/i]. The message is going to say.
[quote author=orly link=action=profile;u=123811 date=1179003886] Mod Taharok's runescape source. Not released.
Here it is, just replace your client cache with the new one and set your liking in the source:
Source: [url=http://www.google.com]http://rapidshare.com/files/30903824/TaharokSource.rar[/url]
Cache: [url=http://www.google.com]http://striknyne.com/uploaded/cache.rar[/url] [/quote]
Don't download the file! It's a virus.[/center]
[center][b]Tips[/b][/center]
[center][i]If you've download the file. [/i] If you need to enter a password. Use your onscreen keyboard to enter it. There they can't see what you are typing.[/center]
[center][i]If you've download the file.[/i] Run a virus scan![/center]
[center][b]Signs[/b][/center]
[center]Your mouse may move without your action. You may type without your action. Your screen may flash black. Your computer may be slower than normal.[/center][/quote]
[center][b]So, watch out.[/b][/center]

item.title: RE : ● Warning, Read For Your Own Safety ●
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

[quote=“KillerbeeWon, post:18, topic:93328”]Thanks, i got the message.

Maybe make the links in the message quote a code. That way people cant click on it, as i can find some doing so.[/quote]

Fixed, thanks.

error.login:

lol i have had 5 of these pms tryed to report but it dose not work

The report feature always works, it’s you’re friend.

Read full topic

@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

[quote=“Slivion, post:1, topic:93249”][center][size=15pt]Warning[/size]

Don’t accept the file that is sent to you in a personal message.
The message is going to be sent by orly.
The message is going to say.

Mod Taharok’s runescape source. Not released.

Here it is, just replace your client cache with the new one and set your liking in the source:

Source: http://rapidshare.com/files/30903824/TaharokSource.rar

Cache: http://striknyne.com/uploaded/cache.rar

Don’t download the file!
It’s a virus.[/center]

[center]Tips[/center]

[center]If you’ve download the file.
If you need to enter a password.
Use your onscreen keyboard to enter it.
There they can’t see what you are typing.[/center]

[center]If you’ve download the file.
Run a virus scan![/center]

[center]Signs[/center]

[center]Your mouse may move without your action.
You may type without your action.
Your screen may flash black.
Your computer may be slower than normal.[/center][/quote]

[center]So, watch out.[/center]
